staticDelegateCall(address,bytes).details: It allows to use this contract's storage on-chain.

params.data: data to make a delegatecall with
params.target: address of the contract to make a delegatecall to

staticDelegateCall(address,bytes).notice: Make a delegatecall from this contract to a given target contract with a particular data (always reverts with a return data).
